amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund in the event that legislation is passed to provide a 50 percent tax credit to employers that continue to pay the salaries of Guard and Reserve employees who have been called to active duty.

action.text: Amendment SA 219 proposed by Senator Landrieu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 219 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 62.
